body:
**What happened**:
Unit test failed with a data race in a seemingly unrelated PR https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/63284
Logs: https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/63284/pull-kubernetes-bazel-test/47917/
```
==================

Previous read at 0x00c42051c3c0 by goroutine 106:

E0602 12:54:50.094795      15 file_linux.go:61] Unable to read config path "/tmp/dir-test733403562": error while processing inotify event ("/tmp/dir-test733403562": 0x400 == IN_DELETE_SELF): the watched path is deleted
--- FAIL: TestWatchFileChanged (0.88s)
	file_linux_test.go:417: expected empty update, got types.PodUpdate{Pods:[]*v1.Pod{(*v1.Pod)(0xc420575c00)}, Op:0, Source:"file"}
	file_linux_test.go:372: unable to remove test file /tmp/dir-test733403562/test_pod_manifest_0_ch: remove /tmp/dir-test733403562/test_pod_manifest_0_ch: no such file or directory
	testing.go:730: race detected during execution of test
FAIL
```

I couldn't find an existing report about the issue so here it is.

/kind bug
/sig cli

title: Data race in pkg/kubelet/config.watchFileChanged
